author: prbuzz.com
title: Taylor, Ricci & Associates Releases New Myth Busting Debt Collection Website
text:
Taylor, Ricci & Associates, the Nationâ€™s leading debt collection Company has announced today that they have launched a new website that will assist business owners in debugging myths and old, outdated debt collection laws and tactics.
Taylor, Ricci & Associates sets the record straight about some common myths about credit and collections. Nothing will hurt cash flow more than slow or non-paying customer. Some business owners are hesitant to tackle their unpaid or even charged off accounts receivables because of old myths and outdated laws about cash, credit and bad debt collection.
Topic such as bounced checks, credit reporting and bankruptcy are covered in this comprehensive website.
For more information, you may visit:
www.mythsofdebtcollecion.com
www.taylorricci.com
